name: n8n-nodes-base.set
description: Sets values on items and optionally remove other values

properties.name: keepOnlySet
properties.description: Whether only the values set on this node should be kept and all others removed

values.name: name
values.description: Name of the property to write data to. Supports dot-notation. Example: "data.person[0].name"

values.name: value
values.description: The boolean value to write in the property

values.name: value
values.description: The string value to write in the property

options.name: dotNotation
options.description:
By default, dot-notation is used in property names. This means that "a.b" will set the property "b" underneath "a" so { "a": { "b": value} }.

If that is not intended this can be deactivated, it will then set { "a.b": value } instead.
